item.title: Michael Brennan's GENERATIONAL Driving Display in Utah
item.dc:creator: Skratch
item.description:
Michael Brennan hit the ball off the tee in spectacular fashion in Utah during the PGA TOUR FedEx Fall season. Our Ryan Barath and stats guru Lou Stagner break down the "generational" performance on their latest deep dive, presnted by CDW. The intersection of golf and culture. Behind every drained putt or hosel rocket into the stands is a human being with complex emotions‚Äîamong them, an insatiable appetite for golf. That‚Äôs what we‚Äôre after.
